Package bridge.toolkit.commands

Class Summary
ConvertMetadata Handles the conversion of any Metadata from the SCPM to the manifest file that couldn't be done in the PreProcess.
ManifestBuilder add namespaces (ex.
PostProcess The last module in the toolkit that applys the SCORM Runtime files and creates the PIF file.
PreProcess The first module in the toolkit that transforms the SCPM into a XML structur to be used by the rest of the toolkit modules.
ResourcesBuilder Takes the list of DMs and LDMs from ResourcesValidator and updates the File hrefs in the manifest to be the actual XML file name in the manifest then takes the Map of media and creates the a Resource for the media file (ICN) and a Dependency element under the Resource with the DMC in that reference that ICN that points the media files resource.
ResourcesValidator Validates that all the DMs and LDMs in the manifest file plus the ICNs that are referenced in those files exist in the resource package.
SCOBuilder Builds the launchable learning resources (SCOs) from the DMs found in the SCPM.
